meanings: (부딪치거나 맞지 않도록) avoid, dodge, sidestep, (고개를 숙여) duck (down)
(곤란한 일·상황 등을) avoid, escape, duck, (informal) sidestep, get around, (교묘하게) dodge, (책임을) evade, shirk

vlive.korean: 피하긴 왜 피해? Why would you avoid him! 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 마지막화) 5분 만에 전남친한테 최고의 복수하는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.10
[전 레모네이드 피해자] - 나는... - 내가 말했지? [Lemonade victim] - Mine was... - I told you so. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.19 뉴이스트의 2020 왁자지껄 운수대통 #1
vlive.english: [Lemonade victim] - Mine was... - I told you so.

vlive.korean: [피해자 쥬씨] [기계 문제] 잠깐만 이거 다 이상한 거 맞지? [Victim Juri] [The machine is wrong] Hold on, this is weird, right? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임

vlive.korean: [덜컹 쿵의 주인공] - 행여나 피해 갈까 봐 이러시는데 - 맞아 그... [He's the one who made the thump sound] - He was so careful not to make a sound. - Right. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.2 2020 : MYSTERY MYSTERY #2
vlive.english: [He's the one who made the thump sound] - He was so careful not to make a sound. - Right.

vlive.korean: [피해자] 아니 여태 그렇게 다 했으면서! [Victim] You've done this so far! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.91
